text:
Hong Kong & Taipei, Taiwan | One Degree | Insurance Tech | Engineering | Onsite & Full-time | 25k - 37k HKD monthly + equity

OneDegree is a technology company bringing insurance to the next generation in Asia, with an aim to reinvent how insurance works from end-to-end.

Established in Hong Kong and operated in Hong Kong, Taiwan, and mainland China, we lead the regional insurance technology development with the use of Artificial Intelligence and start-of-the-art technology.

See our job page for more details and apply: https://angel.co/onedegreehk/jobs
